Service Details: - Sets up collection networks for unwanted products, develops transportation systems to move recyclable waste safely and efficiently- Works with other recycling experts to create material processing standards, promotes awareness of available recycling programs, and maintains records to report to regulators, stakeholders, partners and the general public - Items accepted can include lighting products, paint, pesticides, solvents, flammable liquids, smoke and CO alarms, major appliances, small appliances, power tools and outdoor power equipment
Eligibility: - Please note that not all locations accept all types of recyclables- Please call ahead or visit the website for the location closest to you that will accept your items
